lenders.name: Michaela
lenders.loan_because:
There was a man who was walking along a sandy beach where thousands of starfish had been washed up on the shore. He noticed a boy picking the 
starfish one by one and throwing them back into the ocean. The man observed 
the boy for a few minutes and then asked what he was doing. The boy replied that he was returning the starfish to the sea, otherwise they would die.
The man asked how saving a few, when so many were doomed, would make any 
difference whatsoever? The boy picked up a starfish and threw it back into 
the ocean and said "It made a difference to that one..."

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I have been poor but that poor was nothing compared to many in this world.  I do not have large amounts to give but micro-loans are a perfect way to share.  We are all of a people, we should help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: It seems my entire life has been controlling "money".  I work for the federal government keeping track of monies spent on different programs.

lenders.name: jengsheppard
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to learn and grow and succeed; in our world, many people do not yet have that.
lenders.occupational_info: Sometimes I work with computers, and sometimes I work by helping people.

lenders.name: Dwight
lenders.loan_because: I met one of the Kiva founders and heard the Kiva story.

lenders.name: Jack Hsiao,Taiwan
lenders.loan_because: It's happy to help someone who needs it

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because:
Because I was lucky to be born where and when I was
Because I want to help
Because I can
lenders.occupational_info: Running a shop and restaurant in the English countryside

lenders.name: Madda
lenders.loan_because: I think it's one of the most effective way to help needy people full of goodwill.

lenders.name: Gill
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should share with one another and try and make life good for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to people who have come to live in Wales, so that they can lead full lives and join in, and feel totally at home in the UK.

lenders.name: Christopher Andoh
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the founder of S.E.A. Consulting and Associates.  We specialize in developing country Due Diligence, Risk Management, and Analysis.

lenders.name: Gert
lenders.loan_because: Because I have a good life and others deserve that also.

lenders.name: Cooper
lenders.loan_because: Obviously, it's the right thing to do.  Those of us with some extra money should loan it to the people who could use it.  I'm a toddler and I already understand that.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is extremely challenging.  Aside from my philanthropic pursuits, I spend my days playing, eating, sleeping and reading (or, more accurately, being read to).  I am currently attempting to master running, jumping and speaking (albeit not at the same time).

lenders.name: Gisela
lenders.loan_because:
I know from experience how important it is to get help when you start your own business.
My respect for all who try this under difficult conditions!
lenders.occupational_info: I offer marriage and life guidance.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: Its cool to help other people!  My dad gave me a Kiva account for my birthday to help me learn about micro lending, and how even a young person can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping to repair the world.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.occupational_info: Selling international air tickets

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides a simple, easy and very practical way to help others around the world. It can also be a way of saving money for retirement while causing the creation of real value where it is really needed far in excess of the bit of interest foregone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a public servant, but my vocation is that of helper.

lenders.name: Winder & Trina
lenders.loan_because:
I am lending because I always wanted to help people when I had “the money”, but God is teaching me a great lesson. A big event has occurred in my life which is the opposite of having “the money”. I have lost a lot money in this economy and I am practically starting all over again, but this time with a better foundation “help people first and make money second”.
God has touched my wife and my sister in law Karlla in a way that I could have never imagined. Everything start the day that this picture was taken in the estate of  Anzoategui, a small town call El Tigrito Venezuela. We took our fist born son, Kianno, to the 7 Day Adventist Church to be dedicated at six months of age in the church where I was baptize as a child.
Since that day my wife has been baptized in the 7 Day Adventist Church and now she is to follow God.
I am doing my best to keep up with my wife and my sister in law in their faith in God.
God bless all the people that are lending and all the people that are receiving the blessing from the lenders.
Thanks to Kiva for making this possible.
Winder Montaño.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: DavidnLaura
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Conor
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro credit in the fight against global poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the finance/accounting area of a financial services company

lenders.name: bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I looooove People!
lenders.occupational_info: Taking care of my family. Love it! Minister's wife.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I believe that money sleeping on a bank account brings is useless compared to what it brings other people that need it.

lenders.name: Kati
lenders.loan_because: i think that lending is much better than donation!

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Quite simply, it lets me help those who are less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: it is a good feeling to help where it is  used

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people less fortunate than me.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Lubna's Living Canvas
lenders.loan_because: Coloring lives – one family at a time

lenders.name: Teddy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need as I once was.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very arduous... requires long hours of patience and diligence.

lenders.name: Jocelyn
lenders.loan_because: My government gave me a tax break that I did not need, instead of spending it wisely on programs that build human capacity.  So I am correcting that!
lenders.occupational_info: I help lower-income working families build their first home, through Habitat for Humanity.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part, however small it is, to help others in the world realize their goals and give to others because I have received generous help and support in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student/single mom:)

lenders.name: Anna Natasha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in solidarity, not charity

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to see entrepreneurs across the world succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I start-up new technology companies.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I truly belive in what KIVA is accomplishing here ;) great job people!

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I'd like people to make a better life for themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Ensuring that systems support the needs of the end users

lenders.name: Michaela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: anna heineke
lenders.loan_because: Dit voelt goed

lenders.name: Heinz
lenders.loan_because: This is a real great idea and project. I am surprised once I found this website and how everything is well and clear organized. Also the legal status is more the perfect. I will immediate use my PR Agency for my books to promote thsi great project.
lenders.occupational_info: I am Author, Philsopher. Ex Colonel and twice Consul, Uganda and Angola.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: It offers me an opportunity to practice what I preach and gives me a heretofore unavailable chance to stand in solidarity with my sisters and brothers - even those half a world away.

lenders.name: Nathalie
lenders.loan_because: "A poverty-free world would be a world we could all be proud to live in," Muhammad Yunus.
lenders.occupational_info:
Program Officer (French Film Festival in NYC Parks - Films on the Green)
Webeditor (Mediamerica.org)

Film, TV and New Media Dept of the French Embassy in the US

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others because bringing the best out of others brings out the best out of me
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm all about helping young boys maximize their talents and skills. That's why I started a organization called B.L.A.C.M.A.L.E stands for Boldly Leading And Constantly Motivating All Levels of Excellence.

The purpose of the B.L.A.C.M.A.L.E organization is to uplift, empower, and restore the integrity of these young boy transitioning into men.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because:
better that my spare money is put to work helping people in worse circumstances than me improve their livelihood, than spent on beer :)

i work for one international development charity and regularly donate to others, and i am interesting in complementing the charity approach with the loan-based approach.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to live well.  I hope to help the hard working people of the world to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help create and finish art for comic books.  Mostly, I color line art and add the lettering.  It's a bit like taking a sketch from another artist, and then doing a finished painting on top of it.

I also do computer analysis and statistics work for a global food company.

lenders.name: Jonathan and Karen
lenders.loan_because: We want to give  others  the  opportunities we have had.
lenders.occupational_info: We love our dogs, traveling, and golf

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Together we can change the world
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids ELL students k-12

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to build a sustainable future for their own lives.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others to achieve their dreams!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to realize their dreams and ambitions.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because:
...it’s a simple, direct and compelling means of helping someone help themselves.
“If you wish to experience peace, provide peace for another.” The 14th Dalai Lama
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to achieve their financial goals.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others achieve their goals, it's also great to know exactly where my contribution is going.
lenders.occupational_info: Contract cleaning

lenders.name: webelending
lenders.loan_because: I can and it feels good.  It's fun.  It makes a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Desk work/clerical.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies with their computer systems.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I loan because God has blessed me and I want to share with those that could use a helping hand.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have difficulty with speech, language, and swallowing.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I desire to help people accomplish their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Supply Management Professional

lenders.name: Leonor
lenders.occupation: on a mission to make a difference
lenders.loan_because:
It's a powerful and sustainable way to empower someone right now to lift themselves out of poverty.
WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!!
We can partner with God to do what He loves to do : give hope,provision and empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: My life,purpose and work is sharing/educating people about God's grace, love ,compassion and His plans to provide health hope and opportunity for ALL the people of the world.We messed up the food. He came to the rescue once again and revealed an incredible science discovery to do with cellular structure and function and thus cell health. I have been so blessed through this company for my own health and finances that it is  now my mission/purpose to empower others especially the impoverished whether in Australia or in the 3rd world countries.If you like to join me in making a difference check out www.icantoo.net/leonor

lenders.name: Cassie, Jase, & Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the importance of compassion with my children and give them exciting opportunities to learn more about other cultures.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Tad
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to make a living doing what I would be compelled to do anyway.
